Duck Breast
1 Duck Breast, at Room Temp
  1. Remove the skin in as few pieces as possible
  2. Trim all the connective tissue and nasty bits from the Duck Breast, then put the skin back in place
  3. Wrap in Cling Film
  4. Cook at 100C until it feels like Medium, flipping occasionally
  5. Let rest in the cling film, flipping occasionally
  6. Remove from Cling Film and discard the Skin
  7. Dry the surface of the meat, season generously and sear in as hot a pan as possible
Footer. Not much here really. Nice to have a footer though.
